stimulusHtml: A uniform magnetic field B of magnitude 1.2 T passes through a rectangular loop of wire, which measures 0.10 m by 0.20 m. The field is oriented 30° with respect to the plane of the loop, as shown above. What is the magnetic flux through the loop?
